info.name: poe trade slim
info.description: space saver for official path of exile trade site. somewhat mimics poe.trade style.
info.additionalInfo:
This style does not aim to modify either of the "compact" views, though it will save you a small amount of space if used with them.
If you find a bug please open an issue on Github as I am much more likely to see it there.
